page.title: 04MAIN EVENTS IN COUNTESTHORPE
page.content:
VILLAGE QUIZ (April) SCOUT GALA (June) VILLAGE SHOW (Sept) CRAFT FAIR (NOV) (fruit + veg) { CONSERVATIVE CLUB ANNUAL DINNER (NOV)
LEYSLANDS FUN FIESTA (MAY)
COLLEGE SUMMER ACTIVITIES (AUG)
{BOWLS CLUB MEETINGS/POLITICAL MEETINGS ALLOTMENTS SOCIETY/SQUASH CLUB {CHURCH EVENTS/CRECHE THEATRE PRODUCTIONS/ACTIVE ARTS {PLAY GROUPS/INFANT SCHOOL XMAS FAIR JUMBLE SALE/DANCES AT VILLAGE HALL {INFANT SCHOOL SUMMER OUTING CAROL SINGING/MAYPOLE DANCING {HARVEST FESTIVAL/EVENING CLASSES SCOUT BONFIRE/SCOUT DANCES {ST.ANDREWS PANTOMIME
